API¶

Here is a very loose API for the statistical methods. I’m hopeful that others may find these methods useful.

pypgen.fstats.fstats.D_est(Ht_est, Hs_est, n)¶

Basic Equation: ((Ht-Hs)/(1.0-Hs))*(n/(n-1))

pypgen.fstats.fstats.G_double_prime_st_est(Ht_est, Hs_est, n)¶

Basic Equation: G’‘st = k*(HT-HS)/((k*HT-HS)*(1-HS) from Meirmans and Hedrick (2011)

pypgen.fstats.fstats.G_prime_st_est(Ht_est, Hs_est, Gst_est, n)¶

Basic Equation: G’st = Gst/Gst max = (Gst*(k-1+Hs))/((k-1)*(1-Hs)) from Hedrick 2005)

pypgen.fstats.fstats.Gst_est(Ht_est, Hs_est)¶

Basic Equation: Gst = (Ht-Hs)/Ht

pypgen.fstats.fstats.Hs_est(Hs_prime_est, harm_mean)¶

Basic Equation: ((2*N_harmonic)/(2*N_harmonic-1))*Hs

pypgen.fstats.fstats.Hs_prime_est(allele_freqs, n)¶

Calculate corrected Hs: the mean within-subpopulation heterozygosity (Nei and Chesser 1983).

Parameters

allele_freqs : array_like
These values contain the allele freqeuncies
n : int,float
The number of populations

Returns

H’s : array_like
pypgen.fstats.fstats.Ht_est(Ht_p_est, Hs_est, harm_mean, n)¶

Basic Equation: Ht+Hs_est/(2*N_harmonic*n)

pypgen.fstats.fstats.Ht_prime_est(allele_freqs, n)¶

Calculate corrected Ht: the heterozygosity of the pooled subpopulations (Nei and Chesser 1983)

pypgen.fstats.fstats.de_NaN_list(l)¶

Remove NaN values from list.

Returns list without NaNs.

Parameters:

a : array_like

Returns

m : array_like
pypgen.fstats.fstats.harmonic_mean(l)¶

Calculates harmonic mean from list of integers

Parameters

l : array_like
Calculate the harmonic mean of these values.

Returns

harmonic mean : array_like
pypgen.fstats.fstats.harmonic_mean_chao(l)¶

Calculates the harmonic mean following the method suggested by Anne Chao. The formula is: 1/[(1/A)+var(D)(1/A)**3]. Used for calculating multilocus Dest.

Parameters

l : array_like
Calculate Chao’s harmonic mean of these values.

Returns

Chao’s harmonic mean : array_like
pypgen.fstats.fstats.multilocus_D_est(Ht_est, Hs_est, n)¶

Calculate Dest values using Anne Chao’s harmonic mean.

pypgen.fstats.fstats.multilocus_G_double_prime_st_est(Ht_est, Hs_est, n)¶

Averages across loci before calculating G’‘st.

pypgen.fstats.fstats.multilocus_G_prime_st_est(Ht_est, Hs_est, n)¶

Averages across loci before calculating G’st.

pypgen.fstats.fstats.multilocus_Gst_est(Ht_est, Hs_est)¶

Averages Ht_est and Hs_est across loci before calculating Gst.
